div.bibl: Narod Polski, Vol. XI, No. 12, March 20, 1907. LOCAL CHRONICLE

body.p: The concert of Mr. John A. Mallek, with Mrs. M. Smulski and Miss B. M. Stevens, in Association Auditorium Hall, was very successful. The hall was filled up with a public that attentively studied the technique of our famous artist, Mr. J. Mallek.
The listeners were surprised by the wonderful voice of Mrs. Smulski, and the skill of other artists, who after repeated applause accommodated with encores.
